backend/main.mo: Defines numerous data types and ordered maps for journeys, locations, media, schedules, bookmarks, and admin state, initializing storage and registry structures for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records linking map route‑drawing features to specific frontend files and components with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React app and includes the SunCalc script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper configuring theme, identity provider, query client, backend debugger, and rendering LocationMapExplorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing journeys, schedules, and related entities with calendar popovers, forms, and data mutations.
Debug utility that exposes the backend actor and admin‑related commands to the browser console.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: UI for managing city albums including media uploads, validation, social links, and album selection.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Manages city import, search, pagination, and CRUD with dialogs and classification logic for Geoname cities.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Renders a 10-heart rating widget with hover, partial fills, and click-based granular rating updates.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Three.js globe with time zones, labels, flight animations, and extensive rendering/interaction controls.
frontend/src/components/itinerary/Doodle: Renders a scrapbook‑style itinerary view for a journey, displaying grouped schedule items with formatted dates and playful styling.
frontend/src/components/itinerary/RetroI: Renders a vintage‑styled itinerary dialog showing journey details and scheduled activities grouped by day.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog to add, update, or delete location photos with upload, preview, and validation handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with status display, login/logout handling, and feedback.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map showing travel spots, bookmarks, media, and routes with rich UI controls and popups.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds with tab navigation and URL-parsing utilities for YouTube/Instagram.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs with upload and form management.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Dialog UI for browsing music albums and selecting songs, with authentication checks and album/song listing.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Audio player bar that plays songs from albums, managing playback state, progress, volume, and song switching.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Uploads, validates, stores, and manually processes timezone GeoJSON files using backend and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys with expandable schedules, filtering, and itinerary dialogs, allowing schedule item edits and triggers for map or flight animations.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: UI and logic for listing, creating, editing, and deleting travel spots, including media and social link uploads. Uses various queries and mutations to manage spot data by city.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows bookmarks and travel spots grouped by city and type, enhancing items with spotType metadata and enabling focus callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Panel for adjusting website layout settings such as map options, music player visibility, and default search place with persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines various data queries and mutations using the backend actor, including location geocoding, social URL validation, and CRUD operations for multiple models.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles, CSS variables for themes, and specific heading and layout rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides a solar declination calculator and a test function validating results for key annual dates.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Finds timezone IDs matching a given UTC offset by rounding offsets and comparing using Intl-based calculations.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Manages loading, caching, and validating timezone boundary GeoJSON using IndexedDB and backend fetches.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements timezone boundary rendering on a 3D globe, including polygon handling, quarter‑hour offset logic, and timezone group management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query and identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: React component handling map search, view modes, overlays, and travel-related UI state for location exploration.
frontend/src/utils/scheduleDayStyling.ts: Assigns colors and labels to schedule days and computes day indices based on unique dates.
frontend/src/utils/scheduleRouteUtils.ts: Groups schedule items by day, sorts them by time, and builds per‑day route coordinate sequences.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, extended themes, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for drawing same‑day chronological route lines on a map.
